title: why?
body: So i took the star guardian quiz to see what star guardion champ i would be....and i claimed the icon from it but it havent got it yet and its been 2 days.....will i get it soon or what do i have to do?

replies.body: It can take *up to a week* for the icon to be delivered to your account. If you don't have it after then, please let me know.
im a little late lol but i still dont have the icon....
Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of you. ^.^
